Rulings.Edison: ● This card’s effect specifies “and sends it to the GY”. It triggers at the end of the Damage Step, but not if the destroyed monster wasn’t sent to the GY, or if this card is no longer face-up on the field.

Rulings.Base: 1. If this card battles a monster with equal ATK, and both are destroyed, you cannot Special Summon a "Hydrogeddon" from your Deck.
